page.title: 02FOOD IN DARLINGTON
page.content: This year natural food has been emphasised as being the best thing for you. Advertisements on the television,in magazines, newspapers and in the streets are always saying diet, eat brown bread and margarine, not white bread and butter. Meat is on sale all year round whatever the season. The same goes for vegetables. Not all, but most, you can buy all year round; if not fresh, frozen. Keep fit is now a trend and just about everyone does something towards keeping healthy. Fruit and fruit juices are popular so are natural foods like yogurt and brown bread which are good for you. Junk food like chips and beefburgers are bad for you because they contain too much fat which makes a heart attack more possible.
